### finishAssembly() {#a6abb5b979094dd3eba1a0375a96e365a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void OcamlGCMetadataPrinter::finishAssembly (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp; M, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcmoduleinfo">GCModuleInfo</a> &amp; Info, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter">AsmPrinter</a> &amp; AP)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
emitAssembly - Print the frametable.

The ocaml frametable format is thus:

extern &quot;C&quot; struct align(sizeof(intptr&#95;t)) &#123; uint16&#95;t NumDescriptors; struct align(sizeof(intptr&#95;t)) &#123; void &#42;ReturnAddress; uint16&#95;t FrameSize; uint16&#95;t NumLiveOffsets; uint16&#95;t LiveOffsets&#91;NumLiveOffsets&#93;; &#125; Descriptors&#91;NumDescriptors&#93;; &#125; caml$&#123;module&#125;&#95;&#95;frametable;

Note that this precludes programs from stack frames larger than 64K (FrameSize and LiveOffsets would overflow). FrameTablePrinter will abort if either condition is detected in a function which uses the GC.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/ocamlgcprinter-cpp/#l00041">41</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/ocamlgcprinter-cpp">OcamlGCPrinter.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
